biotools.summary: Plant ontology enrichment analysis server. The server uses a simple list of genes as an input and perform enrichment analysis and provide results in two levels: a table with enrichment results and a visulaization utilitity to generate ontological graphs that can be used in publications.

bioschemas.name: POEAS

The server uses a simple list of genes as an input and perform enrichment analysis and provide results in two levels: a table with enrichment results and a visulaization utilitity to generate ontological graphs that can be used in publications.
